subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Among last year’s 30 first-rounders, Taylor Hall of Edmonton at No. 1, Tyler Seguin of Boston (No. 2), Jeff Skinner of Carolina (No. 7), Alexander Burmistrov of Atlanta (No. 8) and Cam Fowler of Anaheim (No. 12) became N.H.L. regulars.
snippet: Among last year’s 30 first-rounders, Taylor Hall of Edmonton at No. 1, Tyler Seguin of Boston (No. 2), Jeff Skinner of Carolina (No. 7), Alexander Burmistrov of Atlanta (No. 8) and Cam Fowler of Anaheim (No. 12) became N.H.L. regulars.
